Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: Registrant held its Annual Meeting of Shareholders on Tuesday, May 20, 2025; 2,371,361,078 shares were represented in person or by proxy, or 85.21% of the total shares outstanding. The results of the shareholder voting on the proposals presented were as follows:

subsections.proposal_2_executive_compensation_approv:
Shareholders approved the advisory resolution to approve executive compensation.

For: 1,841,270,923 (91.45%)
Against: 163,866,506 (8.14%)
Abstain: 8,350,647 (0.41%)
Broker Non-Votes: 357,873,002
subsections.proposal_3_auditor_ratification:
Shareholders ratified the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as Registrant's independent registered public accounting firm for 2025.

For: 2,214,496,334 (93.39%)
Against: 151,761,444 (6.40%)
Abstain: 5,103,300 (0.21%)
Broker Non-Votes: N/A
subsections.proposal_4_independent_board_chairman:
Shareholders did not approve the proposal on support for an independent board chairman.

For: 737,500,648 (36.63%)
Against: 1,262,795,603 (62.72%)
Abstain: 13,191,825 (0.65%)
Broker Non-Votes: 357,873,002
subsections.proposal_5_transition_finance_report:
Shareholders did not approve the proposal on report on social impacts of transition finance.

For: 214,333,416 (10.64%)
Against: 1,768,753,951 (87.85%)
Abstain: 30,400,709 (1.51%)
Broker Non-Votes: 357,873,002

subsections.exhibits:
Exhibit No. 101: Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language).
Exhibit No. 104: Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit 101).
